wikipedia_page.main: Zubair Hoque (Bengali: জুবায়ের হক; born 18 July 1996) is an English racing driver. He is the only British Asian in single-seat formula racing.

response: * Zubair Hoque – Racing driver who is the only British Asian in single-seat formula racing.
